attributes.title: Highland Brewing Company
attributes.description:
Created on February 28, 2010 by leo on Sourcemap.org:

 First beers were produced in late 2004 at Moorhouses (in Lancashire). The brewery is located in the old Swannay cheese factory at Birsay, on Mainland Orkney.  Currently brewing with a small plant, but will be installing larger equipment from the Guernsey Brewery.  Ales include Dark Munro, Scapa Special and Orkney Best.
